§ 308707. Applicability of other authorities The authorities contained in this chapter shall be in addition to, and shall not be construed to supersede or modify those contained in division A of this subtitle. (Pub. L. 113–287, § 3, Dec. 19, 2014, 128 Stat. 3243.)
